twofa_change.intro_auto_detect: â€¢ ğŸ” Automatic Password Detection - TData format: Auto-detect 2fa.txt, twofa.txt, password.txt - Session format: Auto-detect JSON password fields (supports twofa, twoFA, 2fa, password, etc.) - Smart fallback: Use manually input backup password when detection fails
twofa_change.intro_interactive: â€¢ âœï¸ Interactive Password Input - System prompts for password after file upload - Supports two formats: New password only (recommended) or Old+New password - System prioritizes auto-detection of old password, no manual input needed - 5-minute input timeout protection
twofa_change.intro_auto_update: â€¢ ğŸ”„ Automatic Password File Update - Session format: Unified use of twofa field, delete other password fields - TData format: Auto-update 2fa.txt and other password files - Files immediately synced after successful modification - No manual config file editing required
twofa_change.intro_notes: âš ï¸ Important Notes â€¢ System will first attempt to auto-detect existing password â€¢ Recommended to use new password only format, let system auto-detect old password â€¢ If auto-detection fails, will use your input old password â€¢ Please input password within 5 minutes, otherwise task will be cancelled â€¢ Ensure account is logged in and session file is valid â€¢ Password files will be auto-updated and included in result ZIP after successful modification

twofa_forget.intro_details: â€¢ Will initiate Telegram official password reset process â€¢ Requires waiting for 7-day cooling period before password removal â€¢ Prioritizes proxy connections (prevents risk control) â€¢ Auto-fallback to local connection if proxy fails â€¢ Automatic random delays between accounts (5-15 seconds)
twofa_forget.proxy_warning: âš ï¸ Warning: Insufficient proxies! Currently only {count}, recommend at least 10+
twofa_forget.upload_section_details:
â€¢ Supports .zip archives (Tdata/Session)
â€¢ Auto-detect file format
twofa_forget.result_section_details:
â€¢ âœ… Reset Requested - Successfully requested password reset (wait 7 days)
â€¢ âš ï¸ No Reset Needed - Account has no 2FA password set
â€¢ â³ Cooling Period - Already in cooling period
â€¢ âŒ Failed - Connection failed/other errors

twofa_add.intro_description_details:
â€¢ Auto-create JSON config files for Session files
â€¢ Auto-create 2fa.txt password files for TData directories
â€¢ You can customize 2FA password content
twofa_add.supported_formats_details:
â€¢ ZIP archives (containing Session or TData)
â€¢ Auto-detect file types and add corresponding 2FA configs
twofa_add.processing_rules_details:
â€¢ Session files â†’ Create same-name JSON file (with twofa field)
â€¢ TData directories â†’ Create 2fa.txt file (at same level as tdata)

twofa_remove.intro_auto_detect: â€¢ ğŸ” Automatic Password Detection - TData format: Auto-detect 2fa.txt, twofa.txt, password.txt - Session format: Auto-detect JSON password fields (supports twofa, twoFA, 2fa, password, etc.) - Smart fallback: Use manually input backup password when detection fails
twofa_remove.intro_interactive: â€¢ âœï¸ Interactive Password Input - Choose auto-detection or manual input after file upload - Auto-detection: Read current password from files - Manual input: User enters current 2FA password - 5-minute input timeout protection
twofa_remove.intro_auto_update: â€¢ ğŸ”„ Automatic Password File Update - Session format: Unified use of twofa field and clear it, delete other password fields - TData format: Auto-delete or clear 2fa.txt and other password files - Files immediately synced after successful deletion - No manual config file editing required
twofa_remove.intro_notes: âš ï¸ Important Notes â€¢ After removing 2FA, account will no longer require two-factor verification password â€¢ System prioritizes auto-detection of existing password â€¢ If auto-detection fails, please select manual input mode â€¢ Please complete operation within 5 minutes, otherwise task will be cancelled â€¢ Ensure account is logged in and session file is valid â€¢ Password files will be auto-updated and included in result ZIP after successful deletion
